name: Cheating Simulator
description:
A short stealth game made for WeeklyGameJam, week 105 Cheat To Win. Inspired by the flash game "Classroom".

Controls - WASD to move. Space to jump. Left-click on empty chairs to hide. Left-click on blue student's paper to finish the level. 

Find the blue student and cheat off his test. Avoid the red teachers trying to stop you from cheating. See if you can get three stars!

As this game was created in one week it isn't huge nor perfect. If you find any bugs, feel free to mention them in the comments.
